articles.author: Max Griera
articles.title: Russia’s ‘inhumane’ Christmas attack on Ukraine leads to power shortages, Zelenskyy says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian president says Vladimir Putin “deliberately” chose  Christmas Day to carry out the attack.
articles.content:
The targets are our energy infrastructure. They continue to fight for a blackout in Ukraine, Zelenskyy added.
Ukrainian energy minister German Galushchenko said on Facebook that the transmission sys… [+941 chars]
